title: Diarrheal diseases death rate in children vs. access to basic handwashing facilities
subtitle: Estimated annual number of deaths from [diarrheal diseases](#dod:diarrheal-diseases) per 100,000 children under five, versus the percentage of people with [access to basic handwashing facilities](#dod:basic-handwashing), including soap and water.

display.name: Diarrheal diseases death rate in children

sourceDesc: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019), World Health Organization and UNICEF (via World Bank)
